description: You can summon monsters more often each day.

sections.name: Prerequisites
sections.description: Ability to cast summon monster as a spell-like ability, summoner 1st.

sections.text: You gain 1 additional use of your summon monster spell-like ability per day.
sections.name: Benefits

sections.text: You can take this feat multiple times, but it can only be taken once for every five summoner levels you possess.
sections.name: Special

prerequisites: Ability to cast summon monster as a spell-like ability
name: Extra Summons
